title: Who's the most forgotten champ(s) in the game
body: For me it's {{champion:72}} and {{champion:48}} every time I see one of these guys I think "Oh yeah, he exists".

replies.body: what, no {{champion:427}} ? i heard he's used in the very top of the ladder or something like that but otherwise i only see one like once in a blue moon.

> [{quoted}](name=xaritscin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KLfOURGZ,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2019-01-15T20:13:17.300+0000)
>
> what, no {{champion:427}} ? i heard he's used in the very top of the ladder or something like that but otherwise i only see one like once in a blue moon.

lmao I actually completely forgot about him

I see Trundle a lot actually 
The answer goes to Skarner
And Vi
Yes, Vi, the one champion who has literally been rendered obsolete except when the champion who replaced her is otherwise unavailable.

{{champion:111}}

They literally made another champ with his backstory, region, and theme as well as much of his kit
